channel.title: Comments on: 30th Jan 06: Smith Tower from 4th and Jackson

item.title: By: bluefacedpixie » Ruminations on camera buying
item.dc:creator: bluefacedpixie » Ruminations on camera buying
item.description: [...] As narrated in “Run Away“, my Nikon 5700 died after 3 years and I decided to replace it quickly in order to have a camera for our upcoming Mexico vacation. We do have another digital camera: the faithful Konica Minolta Dimage X50. Even though Konica Minolta have recently announced they are exiting the camera business and there is a newer X60 out there I recommend this camera as a point-and-shoot, but as it’s got a few bashes and occasionally suffers from photo-blur itself it doesn’t stand up as our main camera. Even though it’s been doing all of the heavy lifting for the snowboarding and aphotoperday shots this year. [...]
item.content:encoded: […] As narrated in “Run Away“, my Nikon 5700 died after 3 years and I decided to replace it quickly in order to have a camera for our upcoming Mexico vacation. We do have another digital camera: the faithful Konica Minolta Dimage X50. Even though Konica Minolta have recently announced they are exiting the camera business and there is a newer X60 out there I recommend this camera as a point-and-shoot, but as it’s got a few bashes and occasionally suffers from photo-blur itself it doesn’t stand up as our main camera. Even though it’s been doing all of the heavy lifting for the snowboarding and aphotoperday shots this year. […]
